abstract: Mark Messier, the captain of the Rangers team that won the Stanley Cup in 1994, is running in his first marathon next Sunday to benefit several charities.
snippet: Mark Messier, the captain of the Rangers team that won the Stanley Cup in 1994, is running in his first marathon next Sunday to benefit several charities.

headline.print_headline: A Lifelong Skater Will Be a Runner In the Five Boroughs
